title: NFTDB
author: NFTDB
content: Do you want to start investing in NFT’s but do not know where to start? Have you lost money investing in NFT’s? I am here to help you succeed!Perhaps, you have the funds available for investing, but do not know which NFT’s to buy?The hard work is already done for you with my services! I will provide you with opensea data that will help you learn the process!I actively invest and flip NFT’s and want to help you all to do the same! The space is growing and there is plenty of room for all to jump onboard!After tracking opensea data for a long time, I am offering the wonderful Fiverr community this valuable dataMONEY BACK GUARANTEED! I strive for excellent customer service!Disclaimer: I am not a licensed financial professional and do not guarantee future results or profits.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: If you offering something like this you should add your portolio first since you are newbie here. if you have portofolio something like a link or an address that use as proof for your service that would add value to your services,I mean everyone can say Im the best manager or best investor but without proof, everyone will think twice before investing

comments.author: NFTDB
comments.body: Excellent point. Going to provide that info in this thread! (Thanks for the suggestion!) I can never claim to the best , but I do want to lend a hand and help others succeed.

comments.author: Eh Moo Nah
comments.body: Also you should hire an Escrow with the best Reputation here in the Forum, the service that you offer as a newbie Member is kinda good but you need trust First.

I strive for excellent customer service!Disclaimer: I am not a licensed financial professional and do not guarantee future results or profits.I will provide you the botting program to copycat/frontrun these wallets for only $2.5k per person clean code also works for erc20 tokens.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: you reminds me of the advertisement for solutions to baldness problems, do you want your hair to grow within 3 days, those advertisements that sell you illusions.Try as much as possible to attract the minds of investors and not their greed, present the portofolio well, offer free copies to trusted members and based on their evaluation of those free copies, you can provide paid services here. Otherwise, you will be considered a scammer.

comments.author: NFTDB
comments.body: https://imgur.com/FozTPWtHere is just a very random 30 wallets from 2023 and their performance across 3 weeks. We have selected over 100k wallets that we track and switch out for top performers which is all filterable obviously. Platform coming soon. Happy to answer any questions
